BRAZIL :
Parana
: Curitiba , Campus Centro Politécnico and Campus Jardim Botânico da Universidade Federal do Paraná , 25° 41' 67” S, 49° 13' 33” W ,
IX-2006
/
II-2007
, 3 parasitized nests from a total of 23 examined nests; one nest failed due to parasitism of the nestlings by
Philornis
larvae; some nestlings from the other two nests were parasitized, with the larvae distributed on the body, mainly in the dorsal region; but both nests were posteriorly predated (Jesus2008)
.

[ BRAZIL ]: larvae of
P. glaucinis
on a reproductive female (Jesus 2008, following Mendonça & Couri 1999).
